Name: assassin
Description: Announce the title of another character that you wish to murder. The murdered character misses his entire turn.

Name: thief
Description: Announce the title of a character from whom you wish to steal. When the player who has that character is called upon to take his turn, you first take all of his gold.

Name: magician
Description: At any time during your turn, you have one of two options: change your entire hand of cards with the hand of another player OR fold any number of cards from your hand and then draw an equal number of cards from the deck.

Name: king
Description: You receive one gold for each noble (yellow) district in your city. When the King is called, you immediately receive the Crown.

Name: bishop
Description: You receive one gold for each religious (blue) district in your city. Your districts may not be destroyed by the Condottiere.

Name: merchant
Description: You receive one gold for each trade (green) district in your city. After you take an action, you receive one additional gold.

Name: architect
Description: After you take an action, you draw two additional district cards and put both in your hand. You may build up to three districts during your turn.

Name: warlord
Description: You receive one gold for each military (red) district in your city. At the end of your turn, you may destroy one district of your choice by paying a number of gold equal to one less than the cost of the district.

Name: beggar
Description: You receive one gold for each district that costs one gold.
